  1. Introduction

    Raspberry Pi is a popular single board computer powered by ARM processors. It offers usb, HDMI, GPIO and other interfaces. It can run linux OS.

  2. Pi Zero W

    Pi Zero W is an improved version of Pi Zero. It has the wifi and bluetooth module.

    Specs

    1. CPU: BCM2835.ARM1176 (ARMv6) single core running 1GHz.
    2. GPIO: 40 GPIO. SPI, I2C, PWM Layout

  3. OS

    Ubuntu META is a good OS for rasberry pi. But it only support ARMv7 and above version. So the ARMv6 based BCM2835 used by pi zero cannot use this OS.

    Raspbian PIXEL (Pi Improved Xwindows Environment, Lightweight)

    The raspbian pixel is the OS support by Pi Foundation. It can be installed in both Pi zero and Pi 3 Model B.

    Configuration

    1. Default user: username: pi; password: raspberry

    Library (C library for BCM 2835 GPIO in RPi)

    1. Get/Set digital pins.
    2. SPI, I2C.
    3. Pin event detection by polling (interrupts are not supported).
    4. Require root privilege.

    WiringPi Library (library for BCM 2835/2836/2837 in RPi)

    1. Get/Set digital pins.
    2. SPI, I2C.
    3. Pin event detection by polling (interrupts are not supported).
    4. Require root privilege.
